description: Installation of 12x Antennas and 2x dishes, together with ancillary development equipment
decision_conditions: The proposed telecoms equipment by virtue of its siting and appearance would result in an incongruous addition to the host property that would be visually intrusive and detract from and fail to either or preserve or enhance the character and appearance of the host property, the surrounding area or the setting of the adjacent Kingston Riverside North Conservation Area. The proposal would not accord with policies CS8, DM10 and DM12 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012

The applicant is informed that all necessary highways licenses and temporary traffic orders must be put in place, in order to safeguard the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers and to safeguard highway safety and the free flow of traffic in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
Please note that drawings RR004 and RR005 have both been described as Revised Front Elevation. Kindly amend and resubmit
